SeekWhence

public enum SeekWhence

Reference point for offset in seekable streams.

  • startOfFile

    The beginning of the file.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case startOfFile
  • endOfFile

    The end of the file.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case endOfFile
  • currentPosition

    the current position in the file.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case currentPosition
